raw_text:
Figure 5-173 DLK GWX – Forecasts Menu

The Forecasts menu provides access to DLK GWX forecast image submenus. The submenus list available images and provide controls to select images to show.

SELECTIONS:

Winds/TEMPS Winds/TEMPS is a submenu access button to show the Winds/TEMPS dialog box.

Icing Icing is a submenu access button to show the Icing dialog box.

Turbulence Turbulence is a submenu access button to show the Turbulence dialog box.

5th Edition 5-264 02 APR 19
